      • getTotalUncompressedSize

        public int getTotalUncompressedSize()
        Get total size in KB of all uncompressed files that are more than 850 bytes. Note that we just return the total size since we had only incremented this when the uncompressed file is greater than 850 bytes (in HttpRequestResponseInfo.setHttpCompression)
        Returns:
        the total size
